sheet_credentials: Path to the JSON file that stores the credentials for accessing the Google Sheets API.
cookies: Path to the JSON file that stores the cookies required for authentication or session management.
local_storage: Path to the JSON file that stores the local storage data of a website.
website_credentials: Path to the JSON file that stores the credentials or login information for a website.
sheet_name: Name of the specific sheet within the Google Sheets document to be accessed.
worksheet_index: Index or indices of the worksheet(s) within the specified sheet, separated by spaces.
url: URL of the website to be accessed or interacted with.
